message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think you'll find valuable. I'm offering it to you for $200. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I was hoping to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $175?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer. I'm willing to come down a bit, how about $185?
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate it. Considering my budget, would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $165?
Hi Bob, I'm glad we're getting closer.  To be fair, $170 is the lowest I can go.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I really appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering my budget, would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $160?
